turtlefx

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • turtlefx.World

extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the main window where the turtle runs around

      • showConsole

        public void showConsole(boolean visible)
        Make the console visible / invisible. With an invisible console, you won't have to worry about the controls getting keyboard focus
        Parameters:
        visible - visible or invisible

      • showEfficiency

        public void showEfficiency()
        Print out to the console how many commands were issued to the turtles in the world

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int width,
                    int height)
        Set the minimum size for the world. When the window is resized it will make sure that the minimum size is always visible
        Parameters:
        width - minimum width in pixels
        height - minimum height in pixels

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay(int delay)
        Set the amount of delay that is enforced between command execution so you can see them as they happen
        Parameters:
        delay - maximum of 1000 (ms)

      • getStage

        public javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
        Get the stage so you can ascribe to window events if necessary
        Returns:
        the Stage that represents the main application window
